website_summaries.verdict: Traditional-style leather wallet with a trifold design. Will easily hold several RFID cards, other items, and bills.
pros: Includes slots and space for a dozen cards, extra pockets to keep money and receipts organized, and an ID window inside the billfold
Ships in a stylish box for gift-giving
cons: Extremely thick wallet once your cards are inside

customer_reviews.title: I love the personal note that came with the wallet
customer_reviews.text: I waited awhile to give a 100% honest review. I love the personal note that came with the wallet, as well as the look of it. I bought it for my husband and he liked it too. He is a foreman so he is pretty tough on his wallets. It lasted about 5.5 months. (It was a christmas gift) it ended up splitting down one of the seams. I'm still giving it 4 stars because I didn't see anything mentioned about durability in the description so I don't feel mislead, it's just a bummer that it didnt hold up longer. So it may not be the best choice for men with labor jobs. Otherwise it was a nice wallet. :)
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Took me a good search on Amazon to find this
customer_reviews.text: What's in a wallet? Hopefully everything you're looking for. After all, you'll probably have this for the next 5 to 10 years. If you're searching for a genuine leather, solid stitched, tri-fold wallet...you're search is over. Sure, you could probably spend more for some poorly made 'name brand' wallet, but why? There's no need to impress anyone here but yourself. This holds all your cards, displays your license and can separate your CC receipts from the cash money in the main section. Took me a good search on Amazon to find this...glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was expecting a nice wallet from reading the reviews, but I was still very impressed. This is a very well made, high quality wallet!! The leather is excellent quality, the build (stitching, card slots, etc) is outstanding. I am pretty picky about my wallets and don't mind spending a few extra dollars for a well made product, and this is a value for what you get. The look and feel is substantial and worth every penny. I recommend the wallet completely. also as a bonus it comes nicely wrapped and in a nice box if your getting it as a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: I almost never write reviews, but I was quite impressed with this product. Our dog literally ate my husbands old wallet. He had it for years and years and nothing else could compare. But I bought this wallet for my husband as a birthday gift, and he loved it! :) He can be quite picky, and will definitely tell me if it's something he doesn't like. It came packaged nicely, with a hand-written note from the business owner Chris. You could smell the leather when you opened the box, and the product was as described. I would order from Chris again, no question. :) :) :) :) :)
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star For 2 Months - Now 1 Star.
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet for 2 months then like several others have reported the liner portion on the back side of the clear section came loose at the top. Really liked the wallet until this happened. Manufacture needs to address this problem and it would be a great Product.
customer_reviews.author: MRS

customer_reviews.title: Is Secure!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a Christmas present for husband. Husband works in a secure facility and was used to holding his wallet to the security scanner.....NOT ANY MORE! He came home laughing and said it was the first time he actually had to take his "card" out so it could be read. The quality is top notch, a little stiff at first but a good sturdy wallet usually is. Husband loves the thing and we will be ordering again when the time comes.....expect it may be several years.... We highly recommend this product, great color and came in a nice little gift case. Just impressed with the little touch of class.....thanks to the company
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I am SO happy to write a review for this product! My husband just mentioned he needed a new wallet, so I went online to find a tri-fold leather one, the type he likes. I selected this one because it appeared to be of high quality leather. It arrived last night and it is absolutely perfect! Not only packaged with class, but truly a high quality item. In finding out this is a small business, and that the wallet also contains a lining that helps block malicious attempts to steal information from chip-enabled cards, I could not be happier. I’ll be going on their website to see what other products they offer!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon File

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet, but seam came loose after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Bought Dec 20, 2018 and by Jan 15th the inside seam top middle cloth to leather came loose. Working replacement through Amazon as really liked this solid perfect sized wallet BUT .... now seems these are poorly sewn.
customer_reviews.author: JTG

customer_reviews.title: This wallet is outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the presentation of this wallet is first class all the way. It comes inside of a cloth bag in a nice gift box. And... a hand written note by one of the team members at Stealth Mode (Thanks Will). After you take it out of the cloth bag and see it for the first time, your reaction will be... wow! That's because the quality of this wallet is outstanding. The fit and finish is top notch right down to the perfect stitching. And of course, the leather is beautiful. All in all, a class act. The best wallet I've ever had. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wallet
customer_reviews.text: As a frequent traveler, very particular about how I like my wallet to be set up. Shopped the stores for several months so I could see and feel how each candidate would feel and work, but found nothing to my liking. Pictures of the Stealth Trifold and reviews convinced me to give this wallet a try sight unseen. The wallet is perfect for my needs, the quality and care even to the packaging amazing for the modest price. I wouldn't shop anywhere else for my next wallet and would highly recommend Stealth Mode to others. Thanks for a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tri Fold!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent much more on wallets in the past. Now those who complain about thickness should go for a big-time this is a tri-fold. For a year-old this is actually a bit thinner than normal. The material and leather is nice.Construction is great. The pocket sizes are good. Nice clean look. Probably the best i have had in a long long time. The RFID protection is good. I hit it with a strong scanner and no read. The packaging is nice and the personal.not.from the finisher. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Master Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Quality leather and stylish wallet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this wallet for a week now. It replaces the same style (different brand) wallet I have owned for several years now. I have purchased other wallets in the past to replace it but never found one I liked until now. The wallet leather feels durable but it looks very stylish when it's out. I only have one small dig and it didn't keep me from purchasing this wallet. I would have like another compartment under the windowed compartment in the center of the wallet. I recommend this wallet to anyone who likes a trifold RFID blocking wallet.
customer_reviews.author: William E Nash

customer_reviews.title: OK, a wee bit on the small side
customer_reviews.text: Stealth Mode Trifold Leather Wallet for Men with RFID Blocking: OK, a wee bit on the small side, compared to my old black smoother leather. This particular items feels more like suede than leather. I could not fit all contents from older wallet into this one. When removing from a pocket, it will take a little more time due to the material clings a little bit. Very good quality, feel, even smells good. No need to work about it fitting in a pocket, as it comes smaller than most. However, it being more narrow than my prior trifold, it fit a bit easier in more of my various pockets. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: B. by the Water

customer_reviews.title: Stellar Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet. In an era of "pleather" goods which fall apart quickly, this wallet stands out for quality an a surprisingly great price. I feel like I've gone back in time to an era when fine craftmanship and pride was standard. Of course, this is also futuristic with the RFID blocking, but the quality of the wallet is what really impressed me.
customer_reviews.author: Takoma

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet at an EXCEPTIONAL PRICE
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the wallet was GREAT! The stitching was very high quality and was better than ones I have paid more for in the past. I tried the RFID blocking with my work access card and it worked ad promised. Definitely a great gift idea that you can give with pride. Packaging was really great and having been in the manufacturing business over 40 years myself, not sure how these folks can pass along such a great product in great packaging at this price. I sincerely hope you folks have great success! Thanks for making a GREAT wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Inside Lining Separared from Stitching. Could be made better
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wallet and within a month the inside stitching came apart near the center of the wallet. The seller was nice enough to replace with a new wallet. Well this new wallet the stitching came apart again. This would be a nice wallet if the manufacture can fix the stitching in the center of the wallet. I'm going to have to look for a new wallet now. Just want a wallet that will last.
customer_reviews.author: jeff r.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I have no way to test the RFID protection, but the rest of the wallet is great. Very good quality materials and construction. This wallet is ever-so-slightly larger than most other trifolds which means credit cards actually fit in the card slots. My only complaint is that the see through ID holder is left handed - not sure why they did this and it is is a bit annoying. Otherwise, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L.

customer_reviews.title: Be warned about dye
customer_reviews.text: I like it. However, there is some sort of blue dye in the card slots that gets on the edges of the cards and readily transfers to anythong the cards touch. Hands to clothes to furniture. I got the dye off of my couch but not my shirt. It does wash off hands easily. Disappointing to buy a product just to have something else ruined because of it, and there was no way to know to look out for it.
customer_reviews.author: Muscovite

customer_reviews.title: This product rocks.  Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My wallet is excellent. I appreciate when the maker puts a thank you note within the shipment. The human touch is what people need more of these days. I want to come back and see more stuff
customer_reviews.author: Bud Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely picky about my wallets. My wife bought me a very nice trifold for Christmas. After about 6 months I couldn't stand it anymore. It was a quality wallet but it was "fat". I purchased the Stealth wallet a month ago. I couldn't be happier. It is the absolute perfect trifold wallet. The right number of pockets, an ID window, thin and quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: phxdsrtrat

customer_reviews.title: Best Wallet for all my Cards
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I not have to worry about some one walking by me and scanning all my info ... but the wallet is perfect for carrying in my jeans back pocket. I always had the problem of smashing a credit card (or two) ... but with this design the cards are safe from bending and the RFID is much appreciated when walking around the downtown area malls. I highly recommend from this vendor .
customer_reviews.author: funseeker

customer_reviews.title: I really like this wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I tried several other RFID wallets but all were to small and didn't fold flat. The slightly larger size of the Stealth was perfect. Credit cards are easy to remove and the wallet folds nicely, even when filled to capacity. The leather is more like a soft suede, which surprised me but I like it. Not sure how how much identity protection this Stealth Mode wallet provides or how well it'll hold up over the long haul. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: So far, very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm quite impressed. Bought it to replace my husband's falling-apart wallet for his birthday...which is today. So, it hasn't been put through the paces yet, but it looks super nice and sleek. I love how slim it is, and yet very sturdy feeling. The leather is beautiful. The packaging is A+, and perfect for gifting. Overall, glad I decided to choose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tai Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Excellant suprise
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a Quality Product, It arrived not only in its own box, but was carefully wrapped in a cloth protector. The leather is a soft glove like smoothness, perfect fit pockets for ID and Bank cards, this wallet exceeded expectations in every. Found a hand written note included. Would recommend this to anyone seeking a quality wallet (Kate)
customer_reviews.author: Fred P

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is very well made! My husband’s old wallet was over 10 years old and completely falling apart but I was nervous to get him a new one because I feel that a wallet is kind of a personal choice. I went for it anyway and he loves it. I wanted one that held a lot of cards because his old wallet was way over stuffed. I saw several that only held up to 9. This one said it holds 12 and my husband was able to get more than that in there. Durable and RFID. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this wallet I got him or Christmas. The maker even sent a personalized note in the wallet thanking us for purchasing it. The only thing wrong with it was that it started to rip within a couple weeks of having it. Where the ID goes it completely ripped at the top. It looks great, just doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Very nice...
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a high-quality wallet, very soft and just what I was looking for. The nice little note inside was nice as well. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SSP

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: I like the trifold wallet. It is well made,good stitching, nice looking leather. Best trifold for the money. Came in a sturdy box in a cloth bag, wrapped in plastic sleeve. Thank's Stealth Mode for well made product. I support small busniness.
customer_reviews.author: Kodiak

customer_reviews.title: Am very happy with this wallet
customer_reviews.text: Am very happy with this wallet. It is well sized, and its built quality appears to be very high. I didn't actually realize that it was RFID blocking until after purchase. I use an NFC tap card to get on a subway, which still seems to work when placed directly on top of the sensor, which is a plus for me. Another commenter noted that the wallet isn't designed to block "low band" RFID, so have no fear that this will prevent your subway pass from registering!
customer_reviews.author: ctsims

customer_reviews.title: I thought that I was unwrapping a fine piece of jewelry
customer_reviews.text: When this wallet first arrived in the mail, I thought that I was unwrapping a fine piece of jewelry. It arrived in a sturdy box, supported by additional light cardboard, wrapped in a translucent tissue paper, all contained in a linen like pouch. I was totally surprised when I found the wallet inside. It is made out of a soft yet durable leather. The product was ever bit as nice as the write-up. The stealth logo was a good match for my former fighter pilot husband. Thank you for the outstanding quality and presentation of your product. It is exactly what my husband was asking for.
customer_reviews.author: Airmom1

customer_reviews.title: Father's Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my dad as he wanted a RFID protected wallet. He had over 30 cards in his old wallet, so this forced him to limit the amount to about 15 cards (ID included). He loves it! Great quality leather and I can tell that it'll last him quite a while, as long as he doesn't stuff too many cards in each slot. Also loved getting a personal letter from Sarah, nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Arctic_Kats

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for travelers, a smart gift for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet was a gift for my significant other who’s convinced his credit card was hacked in Mexico. The wallet arrived in a sturdy box with a personal note about its purpose. I took the plastic off to air it out before giving it as a gift and it smells fine. My significant other LOVES it. He puts many cards, his ID, and cash in it, and it all fits and folds exactly as he likes. It’s only a few days old, so we will see how it holds up. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Connie D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Secure
customer_reviews.text: First impressions: I was skeptical when I first received it, but the wallet is settling in beautifully. Card slots are perfect and hold cards securely. Genuine leather is soft but it is very strong. The only thing that I feel would make the wallet better, especially at this price point would be double stitching on the main edges. But as long as the stitching stays secure, I don't see this as being an issue right now. Quality and workmanship is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: davea2193

customer_reviews.title: Scratched and damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Just opened and being leather I was extremely careful in opening. It looks like it has already been used! Scratches and even indentations! Not happy with this at all! I was hoping to give this to my husband THIS weekend for his birthday. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Stealth Wallet !  Great products! Great customer Service as well !  Husband is Happy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Stealth Wallet ! My husband loved it! And he is picky, plus the personal note from kate was very kind, I support small family business and the products are excellent quality, these would also make a great gift because the packaging was so very pretty ,
customer_reviews.author: bfillamina

customer_reviews.title: Had to really search for this amazing wallet on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few weeks to write a review. This is the most high end wallet I've had. It comes with a hand written note and beautiful package which is exceptionally rare these days. You can tell this wallet was made with care and no cheap materials. All the other wallets boast quality and such but after looking on amazon I can say none of them are made this well. After doing my research before I was going to buy there was several ways I can tell a wallet was well made none other then this can pass the test. I highly recommend getting this.
customer_reviews.author: G Bailey

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy, cards slide in/out with no issues and overall happy with it. The only negative to this is that it takes some pulling to get it out of my pocket. The good thing is, it'll be harder for pickpockets to steal it since it doesn't easily come out of my pocket. It's not a smooth material but rather a little rough. I would say with time, it'll start to wear so it'll get easier. Not a big deal for me though, just thought I mention this.
customer_reviews.author: The OC

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet. It has the look and feel of a much more expensive wallets. It has plenty of space for cards and cash and still maintains a slim profile. The leather feels like suede and will not slip from your pants pocket. It was shipped to me in two days. It came boxed and in a pouch with a hand written note from the owner. Nice touch, but unnecessary as the wallet speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: William Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Quality and beautifully made crazy horse leather
customer_reviews.text: Great size and supple crazy horse leather packaged beautifully. Well worth the money. Read about crazy horse leather on line as it ages wonderfully and is not supposed to crack because it is wax treated not oil treated. The stealth aspect is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: L. E.

customer_reviews.title: Not as high quality as I thought
customer_reviews.text: As an update to my original posting, I dropped the stars down to 2 because after 3 months, the stitching didn't hold together and the pocket that holds the business cards opened up. I didn't want to bother returning it and instead glugged the piece closed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Folds flat
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be of good quality and lays flat even with cards and bills in it. There is an odor about it like maybe something used to treat the leather material. I am hoping this goes away after a while. I am satisfied with the quality and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got my stealth trifold today from Chis @ stealth mode. Only took few days after I ordered it. I can tell a lot of time went into its construction from soft quality leather to it's perfect stitching. Not sure how this can be built for the price I paid but hey perhaps it was a mistake. Best part is no one is going to be jacking my info from my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inside Lining Separared from Stitching
customer_reviews.text: Received on 2/2/19 - the wallet looked great and seemed like good quality. It's been a month and 10 days and the inside lining has separated from the stitching, behind the license compartment. Also, just to mention I don't even put this wallet in my back pocket. It's mostly in my work bag, so there isn't much wear and tear. What a shame!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose S.

customer_reviews.title: OK product, but a little tight & sticky; durability in question
customer_reviews.text: Really limited on # of cards it can hold, less than advertised. Put the advertised # in & couldn't easily get any of them out. Some extract with a sticky residue. Was thinking it would stretch a bit over time, but still working on that. One glued seam already opened. Also came with a some pouch - not clear if the stealth mode is built in the wallet or only active if yo keep it in the pouch - not very practical if that's the case.
customer_reviews.author: Tim A

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wallet as a gift for my husband and he loves it. He says it is not only perfect with just the right number of places to store things in his wallet but it is light. Some wallets are bulky even when empty but this wallet doesn't even feel bulky when full. It is well made and attractive. I would highly recommend this wallet to anyone looking for a quality product that will last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY WITH THIS WALLET!
customer_reviews.text: I waited awhile before writing. I've had this wallet for about a month now and am very happy with it. Looks great and quality build. All the best to this small business in the future! EDIT: It's now been over a year and this wallet is as good as it was new. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maxman

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and he loved it. His first comment was how he liked that it was an RFID blocking wallet, but after a few days he commented how much more comfortable it was to put in his back pocket than his old wallet was and how he barely felt it. All of his cards fit perfectly in it and there are more than enough slots for him.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta A Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with wallet
customer_reviews.text: I have had the this wallet for 5 months. It is well made and seems quite durable. It has yet to show any wear. There are two drawbacks. First, it did not a plastic insert for holding pictures. I solved this issue by taking the one out of my old wallet. Second, it has limited pockets for credit cards, ids, etc. Initially, it is difficult to get credit cards out the pockets it does have. This problem goes away as the wallet wears in. That being said, I am satisfied with wallet.
customer_reviews.author: BOB W.

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wallet. Seems to be well made and the leather is very soft and the color is a beautiful brown. Everything is as described by the seller. Arrived faster than expected and was boxed very nicely for gift giving. I would recommend this wallet and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my husband. He loved it until all the adhesive started coming undone. Where your drivers license would typically go started to come undone. The clear plastic covering separated from the leather frame of that pocket within 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: JBK918

customer_reviews.title: It has held up great! No real sign of wear
customer_reviews.text: Had this wallet about a year now. It has held up great! No real sign of wear. Looks essentially brand new still. And the fact it's black leather and an RF blocker is a bonus. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: S.04

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Trifold Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice leather Trifold wallet and this was perfect. RFID blocking was a bonus to me. The wallet is well made and was a little tight on the credit cards to begin with. After a couple of months they loosen up a bit and the cards are easier to get out but still snug enough that they would not fall out. I recommend this wallet and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Steigerwalt

customer_reviews.title: Slim, Sporty, and Functional
customer_reviews.text: As a frequent traveler, I constantly have to carry receipts, credit cards, insurance cards, etc etc. This wallet not only looks super sleek, but is actually quite functional! It holds a lot but isn’t too thick. Would highly recommend after using this for a couple of weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Mercerian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent RFID wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I don't do reviews to often. But I felt I had to for this wallet. Exactly what I was looking for and the dark brown color is perfect. The double bill pocket is a nice plus since I keep alot of my receipts. All the items from my other wallet fit rather tightly and was having trouble settling. Nothing that a few rubber bands wrapped around it couldn't fix. Very happy with this purchase and will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GrateandPeel

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed in a wallet
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get a new wallet, as I loved my eel skin wallet I'd had for the past 10 years, but it was completely falling apart so I had to part with it. But, to my pleasant surprise the stealth trifold leather wallet has been more than I had hoped for! It's soft pliable leather, yet very durable. It also has plenty of room for cards, cash, ID's, etc. that keeps me very organized, but is not too bulky. I've been extremely pleased - I highly recommend. I'm guessing this one will last me at least another 10+ years.
customer_reviews.author: JGL

customer_reviews.title: The best choice
customer_reviews.text: I had hours into looking at different wallets on amazon. This wallet is very well built, looks top class, and folds thin for a trifold. (with my cards and about 10 bills around an inch thick) I keep it in a front pocket and it feels small and flat. Also it has a rustic well built look to it. The leather seems like close to the best you can get, very sturdy,,,, I made the right choice...........
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He’s a bit picky about his wallet, and he loves this! It came in nice packaging with a signed note—what a nice gesture! The wallet is a smidge larger than some and the card holders were slightly snug, but my husband loves both of those features because it keeps everything inside the wallet without fear of cards or anything falling out. The craftsmanship is great. We are super pleased with this purchase! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jeepmom

customer_reviews.title: Quality and sturdy crafted wallet
customer_reviews.text: All of my previous wallets were purchased in store. I prefer being able to hold them to check for quality and design functionality; however, I elected to purchase a replacement wallet online due to COVID-19. I'm glad I did because I came across this item, in which I probably wouldn't have otherwise. This is by far the best wallet I've owned. It's well made from good material and suits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Matt A

customer_reviews.title: good looking wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wallet as a Christmas gift so I have no comments on durability. However, it is a handsome wallet and was shipped and arrived promptly. Packaging was attractive and the RFID blocking is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: K. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Tri-fold
customer_reviews.text: I have had the same tri fold for 25 years, needed a new one so I bought a new one, it just wasn't right. So I got another one, same thing- just didn't like it. Started thinking I should have kept the old one. Thought I would never find one that I liked as much as the old one. But I thought I would look one more time, seen stealth mode thought I would try one more time but not getting my hopes up. Then it came, opened it and was very impressed with the look, feel and construction. Very nice. Think I just found the one I will have for the next 25 years..
customer_reviews.author: william barnard

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet Fast Delivery Amazing Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great solid leather wallet arrived fast and comes in a sturdy box, in a cloth bag, wrapped in plastic, wrapped in paper with a personal note from the manufacturer. Wallet has lots of room for stuff, the money area even has a separator in the middle to allow you to put things on both sides in case you want to keep important documents from being intermingled with your cash. Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Carl LaCascia

customer_reviews.title: Replaces an older tri-fold
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased me several billfolds to replace my old worn billfold. I never liked any of them until this one. The RFD blocker is nice but that isn't why I like it. It is a guy's billfold.
customer_reviews.author: Stub

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good looking
customer_reviews.text: The material used on this wallet is of high quality. It didn't take any time to break in. I feel safer knowing my identity has an extra layer of protection while i'm out and about. Very happy with this purchase. I will be getting one for other family members too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlu Melville

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase for my husband in celebration of Valentine's Day. He loves it! A beautiful presentation. I definitely recommend if you are looking for a very nicely made wallet. I purchased the wallet in brown.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Wills

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Handsome wallet. Design is smart but simple, no frills or BS. On the slim side. (If you carry 20 credit cards, this probably isn't for you.) Leather is attractive, has a natural look and feel, seems durable. The texture is such that it doesn't slip out of your pocket, which has been a problem with others I've had.
customer_reviews.author: MTguy

customer_reviews.title: Love this Wallet
customer_reviews.text: It is made of soft leather and is well suited to hold credit cards or other items of that size. I very much like the clear plastic window that DOES NOT HAVE ANY HOLE in it as I carry a picture I have had for 45 years. Thanks to the company for that. Your wallet is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Stealth Mode Trifold RFID Blocking Leather Wallet for Men
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my husband. His old wallet finally bit the dust. This wallet looks like it will be around for a long time. My husband was happy with it. He quickly replaced the old wallet with the new one. Shipping was really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Drucilla

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wallet!
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for a wallet for his 18th birthday. I chose this one and am very happy with it! My son also is pleased with the wallet, it is very nice quality. It came packaged very nicely, with a nice note from the seller. Thank you Chris!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: beautiful soft leather walley
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this wallet for my husband. Was hoping to find a soft leather, well made trifold wallet with plenty of room for cards, id etc, but not bulky. Received the wallet. Very pleased and it is even better than expected. Would definitely recommend it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: nmfitz

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Wallet
customer_reviews.text: The first StealthMode wallet I purchased for my husband. It was so well made that I bought a second one for our son. Very high quality. It's comforting to know that their credit cards and IDs are protected from RFID fraud. They both love the compartments of the wallet - particularly the separator in the paper bill compartment. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Karen V

customer_reviews.title: It's not like it breaks any new ground or anything
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this is a wallet. It's not like it breaks any new ground or anything. But, it is well made, lightweight but high quality. It feels good in your hand and in your pocket. It is, as described, which is always a good thing if you read descriptions and do your research before buying things. It came very nicely packaged and presented, and for the first time I can ever remember, with a handwritten note from the company owner. I'm impressed, and highly recommend both the company and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Crossley

customer_reviews.title: allowing it to fold easily when loaded with cards and cash
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be very well made. The leather is soft and pliable, allowing it to fold easily when loaded with cards and cash. Best wallet I have had in my 71 years! The note (thanks Greg) and nice packaging shows workmanship pride, which is sorely lacking these days. I have been recommending it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The texture is really smooth. It's a tall wallet and has tons of pockets! My fiance loved it and was in desperate need of a new wallet. The fact that is has a card protector is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: shawna

customer_reviews.title: A Good, Reasonably Priced Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet to replace one that I'd had for eighteen or twenty years. I've had it for several months now, and have no complaints. Note that the ID window is accessed from the left.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jones II

customer_reviews.title: Stealth Mode Trifold
customer_reviews.text: I have been carrying a Stealt Mode Trifold forever. This wallet is the BEST out there! The packaging is done so well, you Know your buying a quality product. Keep up the great work, and thank you for a great wallet Tony V
customer_reviews.author: Tony V

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality of this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this wallet.love the feel of the leather and it holds everything that my old wallet did:i waited 2 months to review because I wanted to see if it would shape up and wear comfortable it feels great and the natural leather will not let it slip out of my pocket / great product and great company
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a replacement for a Cabelas wallet I had for 10 years. Cabela no longer carries the wallet I had. I ordered this Stealth Mode through Amazon and I’m very happy with this purchase. The quality of this wallet from the leather to the stitching to the lining is top notch. I chose this wallet over others as it is owned and operated by a small business. I’m confident this wallet will last 10 years or more
customer_reviews.author: Bald1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wallet
customer_reviews.text: The wallet arrived promptly. After opening the box and holding the wallet, the wallet is good looking and folds up very flat. Additionally, the wallet feels great in your hands, being made of soft and supple leather. Really nice wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is exactly what I've been searching for....Secure compartment for my ID,soft durable leather, clean trifold without that extra flap ID holder ......thin design..RFID block....best wallet i have ever owned..
customer_reviews.author: S. Connolly

customer_reviews.title: It holds wallet relates items perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The wallet was packaged nicely. It fit all my cards, ids, bit coins ,and leprechaun gold. It seems to be a very sturdy sewn wallet and the leather is great and grippy. I don't know if it's actually rfid protection works as I don't k ow anyone one I can have test it....but, I bought it to hold the above and it does. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: clayton blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallet
customer_reviews.text: It's a well made wallet. I just got it and I'm not finding anything I don't like about it. Although, someone will have to explain to me what the lock feature is? The hand written note from Kate was a nice touch and the packaging that it comes with would make it a great gift idea. The purchase and delivery process from Amazon went well.
customer_reviews.author: John Curcio

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be one of the best made wallets for the price. Plenty of storage, soft leather, great layout. I needed RFID blocking for air travel, this seems to fit the bill. Update 7-10-19: The section that holds my driver's license has completely separated. See attached pic. Wallet is 1 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Keith K

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted in a wallet.
customer_reviews.text: High quality and well put together. Like most new wallets, it needs to be broken in a bit, but great overall. Fits all of my cards and just snug enough that I dont have to worry about any falling out.
customer_reviews.author: myamazonreview12

customer_reviews.title: Best damn wallet ever.
customer_reviews.text: Product is very well made, using the finest leather. Packaging done right, this is by far the best damn wallet I ever purchased. I recommend this without hesitation. When the need arises I will definitely order from this seller again. Thanks for restoring my faith in quality made.
customer_reviews.author: R. G. Saucier

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet was purchased to replace a similar trifold wallet which I had carried for a lot of years. I really like this one. The construction is very good, the leather is nice and soft plus it has RFID protection. Cards fit just fine in the pockets and there are plenty of them. If your a trifold kinda guy, this is your wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hill

customer_reviews.title: All around one of the best Quality Wallets i've ever seen!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the Box, Sleeve that it came in. I tested the protection with some Linux Offense tools and it held up really well!! The quality is really good. If there is a downside it's the fact that it grips my pants pocket material and pulls it out lol!! Other than that it's a great purchase and a wallet that I am gonna love!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Thompson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet was a gift for father's day. The recipient loved it! It came neatly packaged with a hand written note from Lisa on the back of the "you've gone stealth" card. It also feels and smells really good! I will update this review in a couple months to let everyone know how the wallet is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Weird blue residue inside sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Quality is decent so far. Only had it a few days. Only reason I rate it 4 out of 5 is because theres some weird type of blue residue inside the sleeves and It got all over my cards and other items, destroyed a few business cards also. Would be nice to know what's getting all over my hands everytime I pull my cards out. Feels like some type of grease. Maybe a preservative, either way it's not good... Maybe put in the package describing what it is to your next customer so they're not surprised like I was and ruining things of importance. Still happy with it despite that.
customer_reviews.author: Tim R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality. Everything and every detail seems like a lot of care went into making this wallet. I'll never buy another brand from now on. Thanks Chris! I'll be a lifelong customer. Support this small business people!
customer_reviews.author: David Newlon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is beautiful. I bought it for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift and he loved it instantly (which he does not do often). It is very well made, high quality leather. I see this wallet lasting for many years to come, even with heavy abuse. I highly recommend this wallet as a gift or for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstyn

customer_reviews.title: I finally bought a new wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I could sense the quality of the billfold while opening it's box and several layers of wrapping. It is elegant in its simplicity with several slots for cards and one window slot for your photo i.d. Perfect for my requirements. I am quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: james a cannon

customer_reviews.title: Good looking leather wallet
customer_reviews.text: My husband has just started using it but we think it'll work. It is made of beautiful leather with just the right amount of card slots and ample room for money and receipts. The packaging and the personal note from Sam at Stealth Mode make for a wonderful buying experience.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: thicker than we expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband because his wallet ended up in the washing machine. We forgot that he needed a "slim" wallet so this wallet did not meet our needs BUT it is a very nice wallet and he might use it when we travel since it has the great security features. It is a very "thick" (vs. slim) wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: The material feels great in your hands and has plenty of space! Bought this for my fiancé’s birthday and he loves it! It doesn’t feel like that plastic fake leather that most places try to sell, and it has a nice dark brown color to it, i was a little worried that the logo on the front was gonna be noticeably big but it is a great size and almost blends in with the wallet color itself. It seems like it’s gonna last so I’m hoping it does!
customer_reviews.author: Kepitt

customer_reviews.title: Extra theft deterrent.
customer_reviews.text: High quality leather with additional theft deterrent to prevent your credit cards from being read through your wallet. Excellent idea!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow very good smell of the leather wow perfect soft leather but like any wallet yeah they need breaking in i bought this as gift for someone and told my wife i might get one I won't have money in it because I have a wife lol
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wallet!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I wanted to have this wallet a while before I wrote this review. And now I can say my first impressions have not wavered since I've been using it. The leather is high quality and the stiching is virtually perfect. I am looking forward to how this wallet will age because based on the construction I can say aside from a freak accident, this walket will last a lifetime. I highly recommend this product to someone wanting a trifold leather wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Just got the wallet and I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Just got the wallet and I like it a lot. It's got a great rustic look to it and looks well made. Handwritten note from the maker was a nice touch. I've done some minor leatherwork myself, nothing as complicated as a wallet, but I appreciate what goes into it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Peters

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, sleek trifold
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my disintegrating bifold wallet and decided to go with a trifold. This is constructed of high-quality leather, folds compactly, doesn’t take up a lot of room in your pocket comparatively speaking, and seems very sturdy. I expect to be happy with this wallet for a long time. (I’ll amend this review should it not hold up as expected.) Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 📚 Bookwyrm 📚Top Contributor: Brewing

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed how great this wallet was the picture doesn't do ...
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed how great this wallet was the picture doesn't do it justice. It is roomy and so soft. I got it for a gift for my man...........it looks great I couldnt be happier and neither could he.............thanks for a fine product awesome...
customer_reviews.author: Ruthann Porter

product_meta.title: Stealth Mode Trifold Leather Wallet for Men with RFID Blocking
product_meta.description:
Wallet Specifications 

 - Holds 12+ credit or ID cards 
- Trifold design 
- Soft napa leather 
- Divided billfold 
- Color: Various
- Wallet Dimensions when folded: 3.25" x 4.25" x .5" 
- Wallet dimensions when open: 9.25" x 4.25" x < .5"

What is RFID and Why do I Need to Block It?  Credits cards, government issued personal identification cards, passports, and more are being fitted with Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) chips. These chips act like the strip on your credit card or drivers license and are able to quickly and wirelessly transmit personal and financial data. These chips help you check out at the store faster, speed up your time at customs, and generally make your life easier. 

 HOWEVER, and this is big, some malicious individuals have found ways to intercept these RFID signals and steal your personal and financial information. Our RFID blocking wallets help protect you by blocking the signals that thieves are trying to steal. 

About RFID There are two main types of RFID frequencies: Low Frequency (LF) and High Frequency (HF)

- LF devices operate at 125 KHz or 134 KHz and have a read distance of up to 10 cm. This is what your access card uses to let you in the door at work. LF devices tend to work more slowly than HF but are more powerful than the other two, meaning they can work through metal or other materials (like our wallet) that block LF signals. 

- HF devices operate at 13.56 MHz and have a read distance of up to 1 meter. HF devices include credit cards and government issued ID cards. The lining in the Stealth Mode wallets blocks this frequency to prevent your personal and financial information from being stolen. 

Stealth Mode wallets are designed to block HF signals since that is the frequency used by credit cards and government issued ID cards.
feature_bullets: Enjoy style and safety together with Stealth Mode's men's leather trifold wallet.
This men's leather trifold wallet features quality napa leather, 9 card slots and an ID window, divided billfold, and our secure RFID blocking lining to keep your personal and financial info safe.

Measuring 3.25" x 4.25" when closed and 9.25" x 4.25" when open this large men's wallet has 9 card slots that can comfortably fit 12+ cards. It also includes a divided billfold to keep your money and receipts organized.

The RFID blocking lining helps keep your personal and financial info safe by blocking malicious attempts to steal your identity from your chip enable cards. Our lining blocks high frequency (13.56 MHz) RFID signals.
Packaged in a handsome box, this stealth wallet makes a great gift for men.
